title: SPAT-based Mobile Microlearning Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language learning experience and mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Need to provide mobile-based language learning content accessible across diverse contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can apply 20 intermediate-level language expressions contextually using mobile content in SPAT format (Still Pictures, Audio, Text).
Learners can decode integrated image-audio-text content provided in mobile environments with over 80% comprehension.
Learners can complete and incorporate feedback into at least three real-world language usage scenarios using interactive elements within the content.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
